At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. products.productdescription: If there's one addition to their trinity blackout range that we fell in love with the moment we set eyes on it then it's their oyster grey fabric. Stone greys are very much on-trend this season, and oyster allows you to gently work in one of the most popular shades whilst also breathing new life into your decor.We love the idea of combining oyster grey with simple natural tones and textures that allow the beauty of nature to come to the fore. Sand down your wooden floor, add a soft cream to your walls, and embrace real wooden furniture. It will make more of a difference than you think...

products.metadescription: Trinity (blackout), dove - roller blind when you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing tou
products.productdescription: When you think of a fabric that allows you to introduce some understated contemporary chic with a luxury vibe, it would be hard to think of anything other than trinity blackout dove. It's the beautiful finishing touch that no home should be without, so why hold back any longer?As you sit down and run your mind through the various different options, you need to think about how to match to your furniture. Cracked leather couches, dark wooden side tables and a feature piece matching coffee table are all worth some thought.

products.title: Konya Blackout Butter Cream
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout butter cream roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackout butter cream plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.productdescription: The ajanta (blackout) in cream features an off-white abstract patterning on a barely-there, almost gold cream that shimmers gently as the light hits it. It will only be your indoors light that gets to it though, as this powerful blackout blind is every bit as effective as you'd hope at keeping outside light disturbances out.Team with rich creams and the subtlest of golds in a modern, luxurious kitchen, for which the wipe-clean fabric makes it perfect. Or add a little elegance to your hallway or utility room, without overpowering or taking over the existing dcor.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cream - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palermo (blackout), cream - roller blind the palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and
products.productdescription: The palermo (blackout) in cream is a dark, dusky shade of cream, that isn't too far from magnolia. It's the perfect neutral, and what's more, it's hardy, wipe-clean, and simple to use. The high quality material and rolling mechanism of the palermo mean this blackout blind will last, year after year. Couple this rich hue with dark browns and paler creams in a warm, traditional kitchen, or use in the playroom amongst bolder, more playful colours. It's also the perfect window covering for a neutral hallway or utility room.

Include chunky mahogany furnishings and bronzed accessories to add depth and character to an otherwise mild dcor scheme.

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Thermoblock blackout cream electric roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 123.62 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their exclusive thermoblock range features soft neutral colours, on a polyester based blackout fabric. 
 
A cream electric roller blind easily brightens up the space,  and their thermoblock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This cream blackout roller has a silver uv-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, a great option for hot offices or sunrooms. Their electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more difficult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. Why not pair with their smart hub - control your blinds from the comfort of your phone while away, or pair with amazon alexa or google home hub for a truly streamlined experience. 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This cream electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.productdescription:
Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers. Pair your electric roller blinds with the smart hub and operate your blinds with your amazon alexa or with google home.
